short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CloudBeds Guest interface to MECX-TECH client based extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CloudBeds Guest Interface by MECX-TECH

CloudBeds website: https://*.cloudbeds.com

This is an extension to integrate USB Smartcard reader or Passport Scanner to read and upload guest information including photo to CloudBeds guest profile.

That will make a lot of easy for hotel staff to manage guest information and prevent making typos.

Press F8 to interface with Thai ID reader API
Press F9 to interface with Passport Scanner API
Press F2 to interface with Door Lock API

1.0.13
- Bugs fixed for detect "Document Number"
1.0.8
- Add CTRL+F2 and ALT+F2 for Key Lock interface
1.0.7
- Bugs fixed for F8
1.0.6
- Add F2 for Key Lock interface
